author: wn.com
title: Fifty-one recruiters in the running for IRP Awards (REC - The Recruitment & Employment Confederation) ...
text: ( Source : REC - The Recruitment & Employment Confederation ) The Recruitment and Employment Confederation (REC) has today published the shortlist for nine individual categories in the 2015 Institute of Recruitment Professionals ( IRP )
